an9.18:1.1: “Navahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an9.18:1.2: Katham upavuttho ca, bhikkhave, navahangehi samannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo?
an9.18:1.4: ‘yavajivam arahanto panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirata nihitadanda nihitasattha lajji dayapanna sabbapanabhutahitanukampino viharanti;
an9.18:1.5: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharami.
an9.18:1.6: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi; uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an9.18:2.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirata nicaseyyam kappenti—mancake va tinasantharake va;
an9.18:2.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirato nicaseyyam kappemi—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an9.18:2.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi; uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an9.18:3.1: Mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam tatha tatiyam tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati.
an9.18:4.1: Evam upavuttho kho, bhikkhave, navahangehi samannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo”ti.
